languages.text: "Сразу после запуска орбитального вокс-шпиля он взошел в палаты записи и, воссев на командный трон, обрел видение. Более трех суток Гектархиус читал проповедь о том, как святой Когнаций воплощается в теле из своих святых реликвий. Этот духовный подвиг истощил силы настоятеля, мирно отошедшего к престолу Императора вскоре после окончания проповеди".

"Immediately after the launch of the orbital vox-spire, he entered the halls of recording and, having sat on the command throne, was granted a vision. For over three days, Prelate Hectarchius preached about Saint Cognatius being reincarnated in a body made from the saint's own holy relics. This spiritual feat depleted Prelate Hectarchius's strength, and he peacefully departed for the Emperor's Throne shortly after the sermon's conclusion."
languages.original_text: "Сразу после запуска орбитального вокс-шпиля он взошел в палаты записи и, воссев на командный трон, обрел видение. languages.text: «Inmediatamente después del lanzamiento de la torre de voco orbital entró en los salones de grabación y, tras sentarse en el trono de mando, recibió una visión. A lo largo de tres días, el prelado Hectarchius predicó que san Cognatius sería reencarnado en un cuerpo hecho de las reliquias sagradas del propio santo. Esta hazaña espiritual acabó con las fuerzas del prelado Hectarchius, que marchó al trono del Emperador poco después de terminar el sermón».
languages.original_text: "Immediately after the launch of the orbital vox-spire, he entered the halls of recording and, having sat on the command throne, was granted a vision. For over three days, Prelate Hectarchius preached about Saint Cognatius being reincarnated in a body made from the saint's own holy relics. This spiritual feat depleted Prelate Hectarchius's strength, and he peacefully departed for the Emperor's Throne shortly after the sermon's conclusion."

traits.locale_text: «Inmediatamente después del lanzamiento de la torre de voco orbital entró en los salones de grabación y, tras sentarse en el trono de mando, recibió una visión. A lo largo de tres días, el prelado Hectarchius predicó que san Cognatius sería reencarnado en un cuerpo hecho de las reliquias sagradas del propio santo. Esta hazaña espiritual acabó con las fuerzas del prelado Hectarchius, que marchó al trono del Emperador poco después de terminar el sermón».

languages.text: « Immédiatement après le lancement de la tour-vox orbitale, il s'est rendu dans les salles des archives où, après s'être assis sur le trône de commandement, il a reçu une vision. Trois jours durant, le prélat Hectarchius a prêché à qui voulait l'entendre que Saint Cognatius lui était apparu, réincarné dans une enveloppe charnelle constituée de ses reliques consacrées. Toutefois, cet exploit spirituel l'a grandement affaibli et il est allé paisiblement rejoindre le trône de l'Empereur peu de temps après la fin de son sermon. »
languages.original_text: "Immediately after the launch of the orbital vox-spire, he entered the halls of recording and, having sat on the command throne, was granted a vision. For over three days, Prelate Hectarchius preached about Saint Cognatius being reincarnated in a body made from the saint's own holy relics. This spiritual feat depleted Prelate Hectarchius's strength, and he peacefully departed for the Emperor's Throne shortly after the sermon's conclusion."

languages.text: “在发射轨道音阵尖塔之后不久，教长大人便进入了录音大厅，在指挥宝座上看到了异象。在接下来的三天里，赫克塔奇乌斯教长进行了有关圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的布道。他说，这位圣人已经转世到了其圣遗物制成的躯体之上。这场祭典耗尽了赫克塔奇乌斯教长的体力，布道甫一结束，他便心满意足地离开我们，侍奉黄金王座去了。”
languages.original_text: "Immediately after the launch of the orbital vox-spire, he entered the halls of recording and, having sat on the command throne, was granted a vision. For over three days, Prelate Hectarchius preached about Saint Cognatius being reincarnated in a body made from the saint's own holy relics. This spiritual feat depleted Prelate Hectarchius's strength, and he peacefully departed for the Emperor's Throne shortly after the sermon's conclusion."

traits.locale_text: “在发射轨道音阵尖塔之后不久，教长大人便进入了录音大厅，在指挥王座上看到了异象。在接下来的三天里，赫克塔奇乌斯教长进行了有关圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的布道。他说，这位圣人已经转世到了其圣遗物制成的躯体之上。这场祭典耗尽了赫克塔奇乌斯教长的体力，布道甫一结束，他便心满意足地离开我们，侍奉黄金王座去了。”

languages.text: 「軌道ヴォクス・スパイアの発射直後、彼は記録ホールに入り、コマンドスローンに座ると、ビジョンを与えられた。ヘクタールキウス上級聖職者は3日以上にわたって、聖コグナティウスが聖人自身の聖遺物から作られた体に生まれ変わったことを説いた。この霊的な偉業により、ヘクタールキウス上級聖職者の体力はいちじるしく消耗し、説教が終わるとすぐに皇帝の玉座へと安らかに旅立ったのです」
languages.original_text: "Immediately after the launch of the orbital vox-spire, he entered the halls of recording and, having sat on the command throne, was granted a vision. For over three days, Prelate Hectarchius preached about Saint Cognatius being reincarnated in a body made from the saint's own holy relics. This spiritual feat depleted Prelate Hectarchius's strength, and he peacefully departed for the Emperor's Throne shortly after the sermon's conclusion."

traits.locale_text: 「軌道ヴォクス・スパイアの発射直後、彼は記録ホールに入り、コマンドスローンに座ると、ビジョンを与えられた。ヘクタールキウス上級聖職者は3日以上にわたって、聖コグナティウスが聖人自身の聖遺物から作られた体に生まれ変わったことを説いた。この霊的な偉業により、ヘクタールキウス上級聖職者の体力はいちじるしく消耗し、説教が終わるとすぐに皇帝の玉座へと安らかに旅立ったのです」

languages.text: "Unmittelbar nach Start des orbitalen Vox-Turms betrat er die Hallen der Aufzeichnung, wo ihm eine Vision zuteil wurde, da er auf dem Kommandothron Platz genommen hatte. Über drei Tage lang predigte Prälat Hectarchius davon, wie St. Cognatius wiedergeboren wurde, in einem Körper aus den Reliquien des Heiligen. Diese spirituelle Großtat beraubte Prälat Hectarchius seiner letzten Kraft, und er stieg kurz nach seiner Predigt friedlich zum Thron des Imperators auf."
languages.original_text: "Immediately after the launch of the orbital vox-spire, he entered the halls of recording and, having sat on the command throne, was granted a vision. For over three days, Prelate Hectarchius preached about Saint Cognatius being reincarnated in a body made from the saint's own holy relics. This spiritual feat depleted Prelate Hectarchius's strength, and he peacefully departed for the Emperor's Throne shortly after the sermon's conclusion."

languages.text: "Yörüngedeki voks kulesinin fırlatılmasının hemen ardından kayıt salonlarına girdi. Komuta tahtına oturmasıyla birlikte kendisine bir görü bahşedildi. Piskopos Hectarchius, Aziz Cognatius'un azizin kendi kutsal yadigârlarından yapılma bir bedende dirildiğine dair üç günden fazla bir süre boyunca vaaz verdi. Bu ruhani beceri, Piskopos Hectarchius'u kuvvetten düşürdü. Piskopos, vaazın bitmesinden kısa bir süre sonra huzur içinde İmparator'un Tahtı'na doğru yolculuğuna çıktı."
languages.original_text: "Immediately after the launch of the orbital vox-spire, he entered the halls of recording and, having sat on the command throne, was granted a vision. For over three days, Prelate Hectarchius preached about Saint Cognatius being reincarnated in a body made from the saint's own holy relics. This spiritual feat depleted Prelate Hectarchius's strength, and he peacefully departed for the Emperor's Throne shortly after the sermon's conclusion."
